content:
"
(define bhdl-footprints-path
  ;; FIXME make this configurable
  (make-parameter
    (expand-user-path
      ;  "/mount/shared/bhdl-footprints"
      (build-path 
        (case (system-type)
          [(unix) "~/.config/bhdl"]
          [(macosx) "~/Library/Application Support/bhdl"]
          [(windows) 
           "C:\\Users\\%USER%\\AppData\\Roaming\\bhdl"]
           [else (error "System type error")])
        "bhdl-footprints")
      )))"
